headline: Better AI Growth Buy for 2025: Nvidia vs Broadcom
summary: Artificial intelligence (AI) stocks led the market higher last year as investors bet on the potential of this technology to revolutionize many industries -- and our daily lives.  The S&P 500 index climbed 23% and the Nasdaq advanced 28%, led by AI players.  Data centers are building out infrastructure -- Nvidia chief Jensen Huang says $1 trillion of outdated computers worldwide need to be updated for accelerated computing.
